name: The Dragon's Tavern
description:
You have entered The Dragon's Tavern where the name of the game is card playing. Build your deck and acquire new cards with custom made cards, then take down the opponent AI with a scaling level of difficulty. 

This project was able to come to life by HomeTeam Game Dev. 

Developed May 8 to May 20, June 16 to September 4, 2022 - 

Cassidy Noble: Project lead, core gameplay, character models/rigs/animations, card authoring, game rules, spell and monster functionality, card movements, majority of card art, base room layout, opponent AI, assorted bug fixing, player UI and related implementation, Hub Area improvements, tutorial book, card buying process, general UI creation, start of save/load system, debugging/cheats, Hub Area light baking

Neil Urwin: Assorted bug fixing related to core gameplay (self-attack, retry, null checks, defeated card removal, Spear Shatter functionality, Inverted Tarot functionality, projectile improvement), deck saving and loading, pause menu, audio manager with related settings implemented, better card randomness, general refactoring and optimizations, spell target particle trail

Christer "McFunkypants" Kaitila: 3D model integration, Kitten of Mercy card art, Card placement particle effects, volumetric fog/steam, candelabra sprites, main game scene lighting, additional materials (fabric, paper, environment, placemats), mug bubbles, card prefab layout touch up

Tyler Funk: Wood floor material, environment models (mug, barrel, coin purse, coin), rock wall clean up, animated candle flame

Luis Montaña: Candelabra sprite, Figure Skating Worm art, Vicious Might art

Rob Tunstall: Background music, battle card sound effect

Simon Donohoe: Main menu functionality (integrated into Hub Area)

Ian Cherabier: Hub Area scene creation, creating player deck functionality

Grygoriy Kulesko: Pillow Fight card and art

Chris DeLeon: Programming assistance, 2D hat sprites (unused)
